NOTE: This package is supporsed to work in [acepad](https://github.com/hoge1e3/acepad-dev), not a regular node envronment.

# @acepad/canvas

A canvas utility in [@acepad/widget](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@acepad/widget)

# functions

- `canvas()`
   - Show widget which have Canvas element in full size of the widget.
   - returns these property/methods in object
       - `w` Canvas width in pixel
       - `h` Canvas height in pixel
       - `ctx` Canvas context
       - `raf()` returns Promise that resolves on next `requestAnimationFrame`

# Example

~~~js
import {canvas} from "@acepad/canvas";
export async function main(){
  const {w,h,ctx,raf}=canvas();
  for(let i=0;i<h;i++){
    ctx.fillRect(
      (i+(i>h/2?1:0))%2*w/2,
      i,w/2,1);
    await raf();
  }
}    
~~~
How to run:
- Launch [acepad](https://github.com/hoge1e3/acepad-dev/blob/main/README.md).
- Open `node_modules/@acepad/canvas/test/test-acepad.canvas.js`
- Press F5
